profileAlternative.name: Tariq Mahmood
profileAlternative.headline: Python Developer at Collabera Inc./Bank of America
profileAlternative.summary: Passionate and enthusiastic team player who loves to solve interesting problems and transform complication into simplicity. Proficient in Python, C++, data structure & algorithm, deep learning, web-development, and relevant technologies. Skilled engineering professional with a Master's degree focused on Computer Science from the University of Bridgeport.

aboutAlternative.text: Passionate and enthusiastic team player who loves to solve interesting problems and transform complication into simplicity. Proficient in Python, C++, data structure & algorithm, deep learning, web-development, and relevant technologies. Skilled engineering professional with a Master's degree focused on Computer Science from the University of Bridgeport.

positions.title: Python Developer
positions.description:
- Developing the existing application features based on Python Django Framework using MVC design pattern.
- Improving Views and Templates with Django's view controller and templating language to create a user-friendly website interface.
- Creating Scripts to migrate data from Proprietary Database to MySQL.
- Working extensively with Bootstrap, JavaScript and React JS to optimize the user experience.
- Handling all the Client-Side Validation using JavaScript.
- Hands-on experience working with Pandas and other python libraries.
- Experiencing in a Python-based environment, along with Data Analytics, Data Wrangling and Excel Data extracts.
- Contributing to team discussion to progress project design and implementation.
- Performing Unit testing, system testing and User Acceptance Test.
- Creating Test cases & Stories during two-week sprints using Agile Methodology.
- Working on existing complex solutions with minimal technical debt. Developing solutions that are easy to deploy, maintain and are bug-free.
- Working directly with Product Owners, Stakeholders, developers to plan and identify the project’s requirements in order to fulfill bank & customers demand.
- Strictly following and improving established processes for Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) with an Agile approach to deliver software before the due date.
- Performing on data Retrieval and data Manipulation at large scale.
- Creating re-usable patterns, frameworks, and components for scalable Enterprise quality solutions.
- Implementing proof of concept, Prototypes and Production-grade software.
- Have good experience of working with version controls like git.
- Using Jira and confluence to assign, track, report and audit the issues in the application.
…
see more

positions.title: Back End Developer
positions.description:
- Working in a team environment with CTO & senior developers and product team.
- Developing the existing application features based on Python Django Framework using MVC design pattern.
- Integrate third-party API and develop REST API using Django Rest Framework.
- Proficient in writing SQL Queries, stored procedures, functions, packages, tables, views, triggers using relational databases like PostgreSQL, MySQL.
- Manage, develop, and design a Dashboard control panel for Customers and Administrators using Django, HTML, Bootstrap, and REST API.
- Use JWT, Django security, and, OAuth2 to ensure REST endpoints are secure.
- Implement Aspect Oriented Programming for solving cross-cutting concerns such as logging, transactions and security improvement.
- Work with team members in establishing, designing and development techniques of the ETL process.
- Expertise in Infrastructure Development and Operations involving AWS Cloud platforms.
- Using SSH for authentication and managing systems administrative task remotely.
- Strongly follow TDD and write test code before adding new functionality.
- Extensively involve in functionality testing to resolve data integrity related issues and system enhancements.
- Optimize the interaction between application and database using ORMs/DOMs.
- Scripting for backup jobs and other SQL administered tasks.
- Working on a complete Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) environment, such as requirements gathering, analysis, design, implementation, testing, integration, deployment, and maintenance.
- Use Postman to test the rest endpoints in the development phase.
- Follow Agile principle to implement the projects using two-weeks sprints, planning, meeting, daily standups, grooming, estimation, and retrospectives.
- Use Jira and confluence to assign, track, report and audit the issues in the application.

…
see more

positions.title: Software developer
positions.description:
- Worked on various projects from medium to large as a team.
- Created application based on service-oriented architecture and used Python 2.7, 3 & Django 1.1, 1.5.
- Designed and maintained databases using Python and developed Python-based API (Restful Web Service) using Flask, SQL Alchemy, and PostgreSQL.
- Developed and consumed RESTful web services using Django MVC.
- Used version control and added support for Amazon AWS S3 and RDS to host static/media files and the database into Amazon cloud.
- Computed the user and client-side validations using Django forms and, JavaScript.
- Involved in requirement-gathering, analysis, design, development, testing, and maintenance with TDD approach.
- Developed custom Object-Oriented Python code to drive dynamic parts of web applications.
- Maintained and Deployed web apps in Amazon Web Services.
- Built architecting and modeling solutions with tech team as part of SOA.
- Provided deployment support and production support.
- Used GitHub for version-control, Jenkins for CI&CD.
- Worked extensively with Bootstrap, JavaScript, and JQuery to optimize user experience.
- Carried out various mathematical operations, graphical reports, visualization using Python packages like numpy,
matplotlib, pandas, etc.
- Involved in the code review team to optimize application performance and efficiency.
- Used Agile methodology and participated in Scrum meetings.
- Troubleshooted and debugged existing applications and various issues.

…

items: Object Oriented Programming with Design Pattern
Automated file backup & synchronization between cloud (AWS) S3 and end devices.
An extensive data analysis on yelp dataset for business purpose.
UB library room reservation system using RDBMS (MySQL) and WSGI server using Flask Framework for Python with html and JavaScript Client.
Created a portable file system (PFS) using linked allocation method.

peopleAlsoViewed.text: First Vice President-Wealth Management, Financial Advisor at Morgan Stanley
Senior Python Developer at Cox Automotive Inc.
Software Delivery Manager at Southwest Airlines
Software development lifecycle experience, including designing, developing and implementing test processes.
Full Stack Web Developer at Boston Globe Media
Account Executive, Principal at Apex Systems
